boardgame.name: Healthy Heart Hospital
boardgame.description: Welcome to Anytown, U.S.A. where people grumble about the quality of their health care but still show up at Healthy Heart Hospital hoping they made a smart decision. Much has been said (and even more has been written) about the previous administration_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;rsquo;s haphazard management of Healthy Heart. In an effort to save the Hospital, you and your allies among its leading Physicians have staged a recent _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;ldquo;Clinical Coup_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;rdquo; and taken over the Hospital to restore its prestige. However, actually managing things from the inside is never as easy as it appears from the outside, and juggling the responsibilities at Healthy Heart Hospital can quickly turn even the noblest healer into a money-grubbing pragmatist cynically looking for a place to hide the victims of your _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;ldquo;care._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;rdquo;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; Does your team have what it takes to bring Healthy Heart Hospital back to its former glory without becoming Hard Hearted in the process?_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; Healthy Heart Hospital is a cooperative game for 1 to 5 players, played in rounds, with each player spending actions to treat and (hopefully) cure the various patients that come pouring into the hospital each round. Patients are represented by a number of cubes of various colors. Color represents the type of illness, while the number of cubes represents the severity of the illness._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;

We have opened, punched and bagged all the pieces, but have never played it. $6.00 Shipping to anywhere in the lower 48. NOTE: --Victory point games has put out some great games over the years and they_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;re know for laser cutting their super thick cardboard chits. _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;Healthy Heart Hospital_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot; is the first in a while that they decided to die cut their chits instead of laser cut them. This is just a side note for obsessive collector types (who are hoping to add another VPG _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;cocktail napkin_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot; that they always include in their games for wiping the char off the edges of the laser cut pieces): _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;Healthy Heart_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot; doesn_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;t come with one! It_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;soot free_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot; and doesn_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;t have that familiar _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;burt_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot; smell that some people love and some people hate.
